Package j.io

  • Class Summary 
    Class Description
    ChunkedInputStream
    Represents an HTTP chunked input stream.
    ChunkedOutputStream
    Represents an HTTP chunked output stream.
    FileUtil  
    FixedInputStream
    Represents an input stream with a predetermined size.
    LineColReader
    A reader that keeps track of the line and column numbers.
    LineInputStream
    This stream allows reading of data in the form of lines as well as in bytes from an underlying binary stream.
    LineReader
    A line reader that keeps track of the line number.
    NullOutputStream
    An output stream that discards all data written to it.
    PathUtil
    A utility class for manipulating paths.
    StringBuilderWriter
    Behaves like StringWriter except that it is not thread-safe, hence offering a higher performance.
